title: Virgin Islands Coral Reef National Monument: Plan Your Visit
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit           Plan Your Visit       Virgin Islands Coral Reef National Monument is administered by the management of Virgin Islands National Park. There are no separate facilities for this site.  For more information continue on to the Basic Information link or stop in the Visitor Center to speak with a park ranger. It is located just two blocks away from the ferry dock on route 20 (North Shore Road). One may obtain information on the Monument there.
